condition.ptxt: Back-up lights do not light up

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Back-up light switch (M/T model) or transmission range sensor (A/T model) faulty

action.ptxt: Check back-up light switch or transmission range sensor referring to Back Up Light Switch Inspection or Transmission Range Sensor Inspection and Adjustment .

ps.ptxt: Back-up light switch (M/T model) or transmission range sensor (A/T model) faulty

action.ptxt: Check back-up light switch or transmission range sensor referring to Back Up Light Switch Inspection or Transmission Range Sensor Inspection and Adjustment .
